price: E dEle é a soberania dos céus e da terra. E a Allah são retornadas as determinações.
arabic: لَّهُۥ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَإِلَى ٱللَّهِ تُرۡجَعُ ٱلۡأُمُورُ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: lahu mul'ku al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wa-ilā al-lahi tur'jaʿu al-umūru
